OrgName.entry: WESTON PARK CANCER INFORMATION AND SUPPORT CENTRE

Desc.entry: A registered charity that supports patients following treatments for cancer. Offers a drop-in service providing information to patients, carers, relatives and friends on treatments, different types of cancers, benefits advice, practical and emotional support. Runs a 12-week 'Positive about Life' course (see separate entry) and a carers course over a 5 week period, 'Supporting carers of cancer patients'. Provides complementary therapies for radiotherapy patients and carers. Also has supportive care for up to 10 patients per day. Welfare advice is available each day, please telephone for availability. Self or any referral.

ContactName.entry: Mrs Karen Holmes, Centre Manager/Mrs Catherine Anthony, Cancer Information Co-ordinator

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9.30am-4pm; Mon 10am-12noon (carer's drop in); 2nd & 4th Mon in the month 1-4pm (brain tumour support group)
